case.name: Ice dress 1/2
case.description: Elsa lost and she's transforming her dress (from the "Royal" dress to the "Ice" dress).

case.name: Ice dress 2/2
case.description: The transformation is over. From now, Elsa have her "Ice" dress.

case.name: Still shoes
case.description: Elsa lost, but she reveals she can still strip her shoes (which were invisible because of the dress)

notes.note: This line is pronunced only once, just before finishing.
You need to play with D.Va, Kazuma or Ribbon Girl

markers.marker: Counts how many time Elsa is masturbating
Active when Elsa reveals she have still her shoes.

Active when Elsa accept a wager from another character. If it's active and Elsa win, the collectible "Ice clone" will be unlocked. His value is the wager's loser, or 1 is the loser must be the 1st to lose (and nobody lost for now).
